name: Raven

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The raven can imitate sounds it hears frequently, such as a simple phrase or an animal noise. Recognizing the sounds as imitation requires a DC 10 Insight check.
